attributes.action: Provide Covid-19 Recovery Passes as letters, same as NHS Covid Pass.
attributes.additional_details: Proof of Covid-19 recovery should be accessible to all in the United Kingdom, irrespective of age, type of phone or lack of phone they own, and internet competence. Make Covid-19 recovery passes available in letter form, same as the NHS Covid Pass.
attributes.background: Proof of Covid-19 Recovery should be accessible to all in the United Kingdom and not linked to the type of phone owned or internet competence. I petition the Government and NHS to make Covid-19 recovery passes available in letter form, by telephone request, similarly to NHS Covid Pass.

rejection.details:
Covid-19 'proof of recovery' certificates are being provided only by certain private clinics, not the NHS, and so how they provide such documentation is a matter for them and their customers, not the UK Government or Parliament. This means the UK Government is not directly responsible for the action this petition calls for.

You might like to sign this petition, which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603682
